text: Kee a Nabiyow! Teemene sayyo kol temeetek xagana koh culak, Yallat agleytah tu heewaanamal, kaadu garq√≥ abe waanaah, dalwa abe waanaah, sinni xaylo qide waanamal, kaadu bicsiten almummaa (ererii) kee diraabah ken baqolti xalewayte xaylo keenih orbise waanamal, kaadu ken kah amrissi hayte maqaanel ku amri cine waanamal, toysa xagna keenih culaay Yalla dambi cabti keenih esser, diggah Yalli dambi cabti li, xuwawli kinni
